# <code>{{ $frontmatter.title }}</code> for math

<div class='command-title'>{{ $frontmatter.math }}</div>

## Signature

```> math avg ```


## Input/output types:

| input          | output   |
| -------------- | -------- |

| list\<filesize\> | filesize |

## Examples

Compute the average of a list of numbers
```nu
> [-50 100.0 25] | math avg

```
